description:
* Based on a fantasy light novel series written by http://anidb.net/cr67126 [Mikoshiba Nana] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr42235 [Korie Riko].
The Arnold Academy of Magic is a school for the elite...and http://anidb.net/ch125983 [Ray White] is just your ordinary guy. In fact, he doesn`t seem particularly skilled with magic at all, and is a bit of a klutz. Which is why he has nothing to do with the rumor that one of the great magicians, the Iceblade Sorcerer, is a member of the incoming class...right?
Source: Kodansha

REGULAR.description:
Ray White has inherited the title of the world`s strongest "Iceblade Sorceror". 3 years ago, he suffered a deep emotional wound and left the battlefield to go into hiding. Now, he`s concealed his identity and has enrolled into Arnold Academy of Sorcery. However, as the sole person at the academy from a lowly family, he gets disdain from the noble-born sorcerors. But he also meets Amelia Rose, the daughter of the most prominent of the three big noble families, a half-elf named Elisa Griffith, and thus his life as an academy student begins...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde entre à l’académie de sorcellerie
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Majutsu Gakuin ni Nyuugaku Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Enters the Academy of Sorcery
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 魔術学院に入学する

REGULAR.description:
Ray begins his life at the academy and the baptism in the ways of the noble folk. Having decided to fully experience all that he set out to do, he applies to the Environmental Research Club and the Gardening Club. At first, his request to join the Gardening Club is rejected on the basis that he`s not of noble birth. But then the student council president, Rebecca Bradley, extends the offer for him to do a test instead. Meanwhile, a spy from the empire has infiltrated the academy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde commence son apprentissage
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Enshuu o Kaishi Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Begins His Practical Exercise
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 演習を開始する

REGULAR.description:
Ray defeats the giant monster that attacked them during the practical exercise in the Kafka Forest. However, a mysterious sorcerer revives it in an even more ferocious state. With the combined support from Amelia, Elisa, and Evi Armstrong, Ray manages to defeat it for good. Their efforts were not in vain, as their group finishes first. Later, Ray visits his master and the previous holder of the title of Iceblade Sorceror, Lydia Ainsworth, to discuss certain matters...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde profite d’un jour de repos
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Kyuujitsu o Ouka Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Enjoys a Day Off
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 休日を謳歌する

REGULAR.description:
"Ray decided to be an organization staff
member for the Magic Chevalier, the swordfighting tournament between the three
great sorcery academies. He watches as Amelia trains in preparation for academy-internal
preliminaries, but then she suddenly requests a practice match with him. Though
everybody expected Amelia to dominate, Ray actually pressures Amelia with his
elegant swordsmanship. This unexpected turn of events is getting the crowd
fired up. But Albert Alium is certainly not amused, and demands that Ray duels
him, during which he uses a real sword to ferociously assault Ray!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde libère sa force cachée
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Himeta Chikara o Kaihou Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Releases His Secret Power!
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 秘めた力を解放する

REGULAR.description:
Helena Grady has discarded her teacher disguise and reveals that she is a member of Eugenics, an organization trying to get sorcerers brains. Faced with her reckless onslaught, Ray is finally forced to face her as the Iceblade Sorcerer. As his friends look on, the battle is decided! Then, time leaps backwards 10 years. A young Lydia discovers a war orphan during her battlefield patrol. His name is Ray. Slowly, the mysterious past of the Iceblade Sorcerer is unveiled.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde fait une rencontre sur le champ de bataille
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Senjou de Kaikou Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Has an Unexpected Meeting on the Battlefield
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 戦場で邂逅する

REGULAR.description:
After the battle with Gray, Ray returns to his peaceful academy life. But then, they meet their new homeroom teacher, who is none other than Carol Caroline. Being uneasy with her from his past experiences, Ray even asks Abbie to fire her... Meanwhile, Amelia makes it through the qualifiers in first place and secures her spot for the Magic Chevalier tournament. However, she quickly loses confidence after she compares herself to her rival from Diom Academy, Ariane Algren. Seeing her like this, Ray goes ahead and says...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde revêt un masque
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Kamen o Souchaku Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Dons a Mask
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 仮面を装着する

REGULAR.description:
In order to prepare for the Magic Chevalier’s rookie bracket, Amelia steels herself with the Ainsworth-style bootcamp. Even though she moans that the training is too grueling, she somehow manages to complete it. Meanwhile, Ray infiltrates the Diom Academy of Sorcery to scope out the competition. He ends up having a training match with Ariane and gets to feel how strong she really is. The next day, Ray takes his friends to meet his master Lydia and they all enjoy a fun day with the great sorcerer. However, Lydia also takes the chance to take Amelia aside to have a personal talk with her...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: La plus puissante sorcière du monde infiltre une académie de sorcellerie
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shoujo wa, Majutsu Gakuin ni Sennyuu Suru
The Girl Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Infiltrates a Sorcery Academy
世界最強の魔術師である少女は, 魔術学院に潜入する

REGULAR.description:
Aiming to get at the high nobles daughters, the assassin group Grim Reapers infiltrate the Magic Chevalier arena. Having caught wind of their plan, Abbie orders Ray to guard the arena. Meanwhile, after having seen Ariane’s overwhelming power, Amelia has completely lost her confidence. Ray then delves deeper into her heart and gently lifts her up. On the day of the final match, Amelia goes into the fight against Ariane with her friends cheering her on. Ray watches over the match, but then unpleasant news reach his ears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde encourage une rose
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Bara o Kobu Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Inspires the Rose
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 薔薇を鼓舞する

REGULAR.description:
After Ariane’s intense onslaught, Amelia is prepared to lose. But right then, Ray reaches the arena and cheers her on. With her morale boosted, she begins to nullify Ariane’s attacks with a new spell and finally begins to strike back. She puts on the pressure on her opponent, but her body is also reaching its limits. Finally, the two girls exhaust themselves and the battle comes to a close. On the other hand, in the final fight of the main bracket, Rebecca faces the tournament’s dark horse, Lucas Forst…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde brise des entraves
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Jubaku o Kaihou Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Releases the Binds
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 呪縛を解放する

REGULAR.description:
After the Magic Chevalier is over, the season turns to fall. While Ray and his class are getting excited about their plan for the cultural festival, they get word that Rebecca has been engaged to an upper-tier noble called Evan Bernstein. Ray goes to congratulate her, but gets the feeling that she is not her usual self. On top of that, Dina Sera asks Ray to watch over Rebecca, so he begins his investigation into Evan. However, the situation behind this way bigger than Ray could have imagined...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde monte un café à soubrettes
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Maid Kissa o Junbi Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Sets Up a Maid Cafe
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, メイド喫茶を準備する

REGULAR.description:
Everybody is on alert after they figure out that Evan is an impostor who only wants Rebecca’s power. Furthermore, after Maria Bradley talks to him, Ray decides to fight Evan. A few days later, the cultural festival at the Arnold Academy for Sorcery begins, and the maid café Amelia dreamed off is a huge success. Ray leaves his class to go find Rebecca and the two of them have fun checking out the festival. However, looming in the background, there was an ominous presence following her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde fait ressurgir le passé
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Kako to Kyoumei Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Resonates with the Past
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 過去と共鳴する

REGULAR.description:
In order to rescue Rebecca from Evan, Ray has to face off against monsters and Eugenics sorcerers. Luckily, his friends join him and they begin vanquishing their foes. Meanwhile, Rebecca’s, and thus house Bradley’s secret is revealed. Things take an unexpected turn when the orchestrator of the entire situation, the Sorcerer of Fabrication appears on the battlefield. Will the Iceblade Sorcerer be able to protect everyone who’s dear to his heart?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde révèle Akasha
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Akasha o Kiri Hiraku
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Unveils Akasa
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 真理世界[アーカーシャ]を斬り啓く
Eizou Bangumi "Arnold Majutsu Gakuin Kouhoubu" Namahousou Tokuban
Episode S1
映像番組『アーノルド魔術学院広報部』生放送特番
Opening
Ending
Ending 2

titles.title: Hyouken no Majutsushi ga Sekai o Suberu
The Iceblade Sorcerer Shall Rule the World
Волшебник ледяного клинка правит миром
Чарівник крижаного клинка правитиме світом
ساحر نصل الجليد سيحكم العالم
冰剑的魔术师将要统一世界
冰剣の魔術師が世界を統べる
hyouken
